text: Recreo is a city of the Catamarca Province in Argentina. == Population == As of 2001 Recreo has a population of over 10,147 inhabitants, making it the fiftieth largest city in the province. == Other websites == * Municipalidad de la ciudad de Recreo * Diario digital de Recreo * El Portal de Recreo Category:Cities in Argentina Category:Catamarca Province
title: Recreo
